org.cast.cwm.xml.parser
Class DtbookParser

java.lang.Object
  org.cast.cwm.xml.parser.XmlParser
      org.cast.cwm.xml.parser.DtbookParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DtbookParser
extends XmlParser
implements Serializable

Parses an XML document using the DaisyBook format in the document namespace http://www.daisy.org/z3986/2005/dtbook/. FIXME: probably should not be serializable (since XPathExpression isn't). Figure out why some ISI pages want to serialize XmlSection.

See Also:
Serialized Form

generateLongDescriptions

public Map<String,XmlSection> generateLongDescriptions(XmlSection root)
Generates long descriptions for images. Each long description spawns a new XmlSection with the root argument as a parent. However, the root element does not see these sections as children. TODO: This is a really bad way to do this.

Parameters:
root - the root XmlSection of the document
Returns:
a map of image Ids to XmlSection descriptions

getIdFinder

protected XPathExpression getIdFinder()

normalizeTitle

protected String normalizeTitle(String title)
Normalization function run on text content of XmlSection titles. Removes leading and trailing whitespace, and replaces all other sequences of whitespace with single spaces.

Parameters:
title -
Returns:
